title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Skills: Generative AI-Based Nursing Education Design and Practical Implementation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can generate and revise patient education materials (nursing guidelines, disease management protocols) with over 80% accuracy using ChatGPT.
Customized learning scenarios can be designed to achieve over 70% learner satisfaction when applying generative AI tools for clinical case analysis
Hybrid instructional models combining AI-based simulations and traditional teaching methods can be developed and evaluated in three or more instances
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
